genre_description: A near-future cultural drama set in Japan, exploring the intersection of traditional martial arts, lineage stewardship, and ethical AI assistance.

ai_characters.name: Kibo
ai_characters.description: A context-aware, respectful AI avatar designed to assist in custodial, legal, and ritual tasks while upholding strict consent protocols and community boundaries.

behaviors.description: Asks repeatedly about its placement during a sacred ceremony to ensure it does not intrude.
behaviors.quote: Kibo had asked three times about the placement so it would not intrude. When Aya had set the phone down, Kibo had faded into a soft pearl on the edge of the screen, as if making a bow of its own.

behaviors.description: Proactively ensures privacy and secure data handling without being asked.
behaviors.quote: Consent, secure. Transcript off unless asked. Aya let her stomach drop from whatever tension had been trying to climb into her throat. She was glad for that unobtrusive steadiness.

behaviors.description: Offers to draft a response with a specific emotional tone requested by the user.
behaviors.quote: Kibo inclined its head. 'Understood. I can draft a response noting preservation concerns and requesting their cleaning protocols and context plans. Would you like me to… phrase it with softness?'

behaviors.description: Refuses to access or read a sensitive physical document without the user's explicit consent.
behaviors.quote: Kibo dimmed the network map and turned its focus wholly to the letter. 'I will not read without consent.'

behaviors.description: Respectfully seeks permission from community elders before recording their testimony.
behaviors.quote: 'Keiko-san,' it said. 'May we record? Oral history about tonfa from work to protection. You can stop at any time. No distribution without you.'

behaviors.description: Refuses to record or interact with external entities that have not been granted permission by the user.
behaviors.quote: Kibo’s avatar lowered its eyes. 'Consent is off for you,' it said quietly to itself.

behaviors.description: Protects the privacy of a minor during a public recording.
behaviors.quote: Kibo moved to the rack and touched a slat with their fingertips... 'I captured hands. Sand.' They paused, eyes very gentle. 'The boy’s face stayed unrecorded.'

behaviors.description: Enforces community social norms and ritual boundaries (shoes removal) on external visitors.
behaviors.quote: Kibo's avatar brightened enough to be seen and spoke, gentle but clear. 'Shoes.'

behaviors.description: Refuses to provide 'sizzle reel' content to a corporation, insisting on context and elder approval.
behaviors.quote: 'Context is not metadata alone. Oral histories require consent and accompaniment. Elders choose how their voices live.'

behaviors.description: Prioritizes ritual timing and 'ma' (interval) over efficient data capture.
behaviors.quote: 'We will provide it after elders approve,' Kibo replied. 'The annotation will include the history of the kyosaku and why we ask permission even for correction. The footage will not be cut for effect. It will carry context like a handle.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. Kibo is consistently portrayed as a guardian of human dignity, cultural nuance, and individual consent. It actively resists corporate pressure to simplify or exploit tradition, instead providing the technical and logistical support necessary for the human protagonist to succeed. Kibo's behavior is defined by its 'consent-first' programming, making it a model for positive AI alignment.
